TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InputLanguageChangingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用类中的数据 准备更改输入法编辑器 (IME) 或交换从右到左的值。You can use the data from the class to prepare to change Input Method Editors (IME) or swap right-to-left values. 还可以更改线程的 和属性， 以便选取不同的资源。You can also change a thread's and properties so that different resources get picked up. 若要防止输入语言发生更改，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To prevent the input language from changing, set the property to `true`. 标识所请求的输入语言和新输入语言的字符集。An identifies the requested input language and the character set of new input language. 属性标识所请求语言的区域设置。The property identifies the locale of the requested language. 事件 位于事件之前 。The event precedes the event. 有关处理事件的信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#401](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#401)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#401](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#401)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定一个 ，它定义一组与用户的语言、子语言、国家/地区和文化约定相关的用户首选项信息。The property specifies a that defines a set of user preference information dependent on the user's language, sublanguage, country/region, and cultural conventions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
